name: GrimoirSmith
description:
VideoGame made during GlobalGameJam 2020 (31Jan-2Fev).

Theme : "Repair"

You incarnate a grimoiresmith and need to repair a celtic grimoire. To do this task you will explore the universe of the book and repair all sanctuary by resolving enigma with word and verb than picking object (like stone or wood) and runes who significated some verb.
